projects.title: Microsoft Dynamics CRM 365
projects.description: Responsible for overseeing the company's requirements, development, testing and deployment of Microsoft CRM projects. Customized Field service module to integrate inspection into it asp per business process. Used MS Dynamics CRM customization tool to customize system component such as forms, views etc. Designed custom action to optimize system.

projects.title: HCFC
projects.description: HCF is a compliance system for Healthcare. It provides ongoing compliance status notifications, tracking and reports, all which improve hospitals and nursing homes abilities to conform to the The Joint Commission's physical environment compliance requirements.
